content.title: Savitribai Phule Scholarship For V.J.N.T. And S.B.C. Girl Students Studying In 5th To 7th Standard
content.department: Social Justice and Special Assistance Department
content.beneficiary: Girl Students of Vimukta Jati and Nomadic Tribes (VJNT) and Special Backward Classes (SBC)
content.details: Savitribai Phule Scholarship is a Scholarship Scheme by the Social Justice and Special Assistance Department, Government of Maharashtra. The scheme was introduced on 12th January 1996 and amended on 29th October 1996 to include S.B.C. Students. The objective of the scheme is to encourage the enrollment and decrease the dropout ratio of Girl Students of Maharashtra from VJNT and SBC, studying in Class 5th to Class 7th. The beneficiary is provided ₹ 60/- per month, i.e. ₹ 600/- for ten months.
benefits: Financial assistance of ₹ 60/- per month for ten months
eligibility: The applicant must be a girl.
The applicant must be a resident of the state of Maharashtra.
The applicant must belong to Vimukta Jati and Nomadic Tribes (VJNT) or Special Backward Classes (SBC) Category.
The applicant must be studying in Class 5th to Class 7th.
The applicant must be studying in a Government Recognized School.
documents_required: Caste Certificate VJNT or SBC Community (duly signed by an authorized Revenue Officer not below the rank of Tehsildar)
Marksheet of the Latest Educational Qualification

faqs.question: What Is The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The Savitribai Phule Scholarship is a scholarship program initiated by the Government of Maharashtra to provide financial assistance to girl students belonging to the Vimukta Jati and Nomadic Tribes (VJNT) and Special Backward Classes (SBC) studying in 5th to 7th standard.

faqs.question: Who Is Eligible For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Girl students belonging to the VJNT and SBC communities studying in 5th to 7th standard in Maharashtra are eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: How Can I Apply For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The application process for the scholarship is online through the MahaDBT portal. Eligible students can apply by filling the online application form and submitting the required documents.

faqs.question: What Is The Last Date To Apply For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The last date to apply for the scholarship is usually in the month of November. However, students are advised to check the official website for the current year's deadline.

faqs.question: How Will I Know If My Application For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship Is Accepted?
faqs.answer: Students can check the status of their application online through the MahaDBT portal. They will also receive a notification through SMS and email.

faqs.question: When Will The Scholarship Amount Be Disbursed?
faqs.answer: The scholarship amount will be disbursed to the student's bank account after the verification process is completed. Usually, it takes 2-3 months after the application deadline.

faqs.question: Can I Apply For The Scholarship For Multiple Standards At Once?
faqs.answer: No, students need to apply separately for each standard they are studying in.

faqs.question: Can I Apply For The Scholarship If I Have Already Received It In The Previous Year?
faqs.answer: Yes, students can apply for the scholarship for each year they are eligible.

faqs.question: What If I Am Unable To Submit All The Required Documents For The Scholarship Application?
faqs.answer: Incomplete applications will be rejected. Therefore, it is important to ensure that all required documents are submitted along with the application.

faqs.question: Can I Apply For The Scholarship Offline?
faqs.answer: No, the application process for the scholarship is only online through the MahaDBT portal.

faqs.question: Is The Savitribai Phule Scholarship Available For Students Studying In Maharashtra Only?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scholarship is available for girl students studying in Maharashtra only.

faqs.question: Do I Need To Create An Account On The MahaDBT Portal To Apply For The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, students need to create an account on the MahaDBT portal to apply for the scholarship.

faqs.question: What Is The Age Limit To Be Eligible For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: There is no specific age limit mentioned in the eligibility criteria for the scholarship.

faqs.question: Do I Need To Be A Resident Of Maharashtra To Be Eligible For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scholarship is only available for girl students studying in schools in Maharashtra.

faqs.question: Can Male Students Apply For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, the scholarship is only available for girl students.

faqs.question: Do I Need To Belong To A Specific Caste To Be Eligible For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scholarship is only available for girl students belonging to the Vimukta Jati and Nomadic Tribes (VJNT) and Special Backward Classes (SBC).

faqs.question: Can Students Studying In Any Standard From 5th To 7th Apply For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, girl students studying in 5th to 7th standard are eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: Do I Need To Have A Certain Percentage Of Marks To Be Eligible For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, there is no minimum percentage of marks required to be eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: Can Students Who Have Dropped Out Of School Apply For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, the scholarship is only available for students who are currently enrolled in schools.

faqs.question: Can Students Who Are Studying In Vocational Courses Apply For The Savitribai Phule Scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, the scholarship is only available for girl students studying in 5th to 7th standard.
